id.description: Unique ID for order generated by the system.

orderNumber.description: Identifier for an order automatically generated by the system and unique for that Institution across all vendors.

vendorOrderNumber.description: Identifier for an order provided by the vendor and unique for that institution and vendor.  This is an optional field.

externalOrderId.description: Alphanumeric string representing an external financial systemâ€™s ID for a specific order in Acquisitions.
